name: SUPER KINKY
description:
THE STORY:Once there was an ordinary young woman (a very horny, ordinary young woman) to whom something extraordinary happened. One night during a heated threesome a bizarre accident occurred transforming her into SUPER KINKY, defender of mankind's naughty pleasures.

Now the succubus LILITH has stolen all of Earth's sex toys and taken them to the lusty second circle of Hell as gifts for her minions. Only one hero is kinky enough to penetrate the devil's back door and beat off evil to retrieve them. It's up to SUPER KINKY to restore naughty pleasure to humanity.THREE UNIQUE ARENAS:Master three challenging arenas and do battle with enemies ranging from demonic gimps and bone-wielding skeletons to voracious vamps and fireball-throwing demons.


SUCKFEST - A lair of female vampires hunger to suck you dry.
BAREBONED - Hard bone pounds soft flesh in this skeleton-filled dungeon.
HOT AND HORNY - Flaming demons unload their fiery balls all over an ancient foundry.KEY FEATURES:

  • High-speed, old-school FPS action
  • Environmental hazards and deadly traps
  • Over-the-top Character customization
  • Dozens of toy types to boost your score
  • In-game highscore tracking and objective system
  • Destructible props and random item drops from enemies
  • Gallery of 50 naughty magazines to collect
  • Mature sexual humor
WARNING!:This game is designed for mature audiences and may not be suitable for all players as it contains the following:


  • BLOOD AND GORE
  • INTENSE VIOLENCE
  • STRONG LANGUAGE
  • STRONG SEXUAL CONTENT
  • MATURE HUMOR
  • NUDITY
  • DISTURBING IMAGERY
  • SATANIC SYMBOLISM
